event.description: Rajai Davis doubles (14) on a line drive to left fielder Josh Reddick.
Eric Thames flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
With Jose Bautista batting, Rajai Davis steals (22) 3rd base, Rajai Davis scores. Missed catch error by third baseman Kevin Youkilis.
Jose Bautista grounds out, second baseman Dustin Pedroia to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Adam Lind strikes out swinging.
Edwin Encarnacion flies out to left fielder Josh Reddick.
Aaron Hill homers (4) on a fly ball to left field.
Travis Snider doubles (5) on a line drive to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Jose Molina strikes out swinging.
John McDonald singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. Travis Snider scores.
Rajai Davis pops out to second baseman Dustin Pedroia.
Eric Thames singles on a line drive to left fielder Josh Reddick.
Jose Bautista singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Josh Reddick. Eric Thames to 2nd.
Adam Lind singles on a line drive to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. Eric Thames scores. Jose Bautista to 2nd.
Edwin Encarnacion flies out to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury.
Aaron Hill singles on a line drive to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. Jose Bautista scores. Adam Lind to 2nd.
Travis Snider doubles (6) on a line drive to right fielder J. D. Drew. Adam Lind scores. Aaron Hill scores.
Pitcher Change: Dan Wheeler replaces John Lackey.
Jose Molina flies out to right fielder J. D. Drew.
John McDonald flies out to left fielder Josh Reddick.
Rajai Davis flies out to right fielder J. Drew.
Eric Thames pops out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Jose Bautista flies out to right fielder J. D. Drew.
Yamaico Navarro remains in the game as the third baseman.
Adam Lind grounds out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Edwin Encarnacion lines out to shortstop Marco Scutaro.
Aaron Hill grounds out, shortstop Marco Scutaro to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Pitcher Change: Alfredo Aceves replaces Dan Wheeler.
Travis Snider doubles (7) on a ground ball to right fielder J. D. Drew.
Jose Molina out on a sacrifice bunt, pitcher Alfredo Aceves to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez. Travis Snider to 3rd.
John McDonald pops out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez in foul territory.
Rajai Davis pops out to shortstop Marco Scutaro.
Darnell McDonald remains in the game as the left fielder.
Eric Thames flies out to right fielder J. D. Drew.
Jose Bautista grounds out sharply, third baseman Yamaico Navarro to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Adam Lind walks.
Edwin Encarnacion reaches on fielding error by third baseman Yamaico Navarro. Adam Lind scores. Edwin Encarnacion to 2nd.
Aaron Hill grounds out, third baseman Yamaico Navarro to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Travis Snider grounds out to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Jose Molina strikes out swinging.
John McDonald singles on a ground ball to left fielder Darnell McDonald.
Rajai Davis doubles (15) on a fly ball to center fielder Jacoby Ellsbury. John McDonald scores. Rajai Davis to 3rd on the throw.
Pitcher Change: Franklin Morales replaces Alfredo Aceves.
Eric Thames walks.
With Jose Bautista batting, Franklin Morales picks off Eric Thames at 1st on throw to Adrian Gonzalez.
Pitcher Change: Matt Albers replaces Franklin Morales.
Jose Bautista grounds out, third baseman Yamaico Navarro to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Adam Lind walks.
Edwin Encarnacion lines out to left fielder Darnell McDonald.
Aaron Hill singles on a ground ball to shortstop Marco Scutaro. Adam Lind to 2nd.
Travis Snider grounds out, third baseman Yamaico Navarro to first baseman Adrian Gonzalez.
Jacoby Ellsbury singles on a line drive to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Dustin Pedroia grounds into a force out, shortstop John McDonald to second baseman Aaron Hill. Jacoby Ellsbury out at 2nd. Dustin Pedroia to 1st.
Adrian Gonzalez strikes out swinging and Dustin Pedroia caught stealing 2nd, catcher Jose Molina to shortstop John McDonald.
Kevin Youkilis pops out to second baseman Aaron Hill.
David Ortiz strikes out swinging.
Josh Reddick strikes out swinging. Wild pitch by pitcher Brandon Morrow. Josh Reddick to 1st.
With Jarrod Saltalamacchia batting, Jose Molina picks off Josh Reddick at 1st on throw to Adam Lind.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia grounds out to first baseman Adam Lind.
J. D. Drew strikes out swinging.
Marco Scutaro singles on a line drive to left fielder Eric Thames.
Jacoby Ellsbury flies out to right fielder Travis Snider.
Dustin Pedroia flies out to left fielder Eric Thames.
Adrian Gonzalez grounds out, second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Adam Lind.
Kevin Youkilis hit by pitch.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch runner Yamaico Navarro replaces Kevin Youkilis.
David Ortiz grounds into a force out, shortstop John McDonald to third baseman Jose Bautista. Yamaico Navarro out at 2nd.
Josh Reddick flies out to left fielder Eric Thames.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia strikes out swinging.
J. D. Drew singles on a ground ball to center fielder Rajai Davis.
Marco Scutaro walks. J. D. Drew to 2nd.
Jacoby Ellsbury triples (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Travis Snider. J. D. Drew scores. Marco Scutaro scores.
Dustin Pedroia walks. Passed ball by catcher Jose Molina. Jacoby Ellsbury scores.
Adrian Gonzalez doubles (28) on a fly ball to left fielder Eric Thames. Dustin Pedroia scores.
Yamaico Navarro grounds out, second baseman Aaron Hill to first baseman Adam Lind.
David Ortiz walks.
Pitcher Change: Luis Perez replaces Brandon Morrow.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Darnell McDonald replaces Josh Reddick.
Darnell McDonald strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia grounds out, third baseman Jose Bautista to first baseman Adam Lind. David Ortiz to 2nd.
J. D. Drew strikes out swinging.
Marco Scutaro grounds out, third baseman Jose Bautista to first baseman Adam Lind.
Jacoby Ellsbury singles on a ground ball to shortstop John McDonald, deflected by pitcher Luis Perez.
Dustin Pedroia singles on a soft line drive to center fielder Rajai Davis. Jacoby Ellsbury to 2nd.
Adrian Gonzalez grounds into double play, first baseman Adam Lind to shortstop John McDonald to pitcher Luis Perez. Dustin Pedroia out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Jason Frasor replaces Luis Perez.
Yamaico Navarro singles on a ground ball to center fielder Rajai Davis.
David Ortiz hits a ground-rule double (21) on a fly ball down the left-field line. Yamaico Navarro to 3rd.
Darnell McDonald strikes out swinging.
Jarrod Saltalamacchia triples (2) on a fly ball to left fielder Eric Thames. Yamaico Navarro scores. David Ortiz scores.
J. D. Drew out on a sacrifice fly to left fielder Eric Thames. Jarrod Saltalamacchia scores.
Marco Scutaro called out on strikes.
Pitcher Change: Frank Francisco replaces Jason Frasor.
Jacoby Ellsbury singles on a ground ball to right fielder Travis Snider, deflected by second baseman Aaron Hill.
With Dustin Pedroia batting, Jacoby Ellsbury steals (27) 2nd base.
Dustin Pedroia strikes out swinging.
Adrian Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
Yamaico Navarro strikes out swinging.
